thread.title: UK's sluggish economy to grow a bit more quickly - Finance Minister Hammond

title: UK's sluggish economy to grow a bit more quickly - Finance Minister Hammond
text:
UK's sluggish economy to grow a bit more quickly - Finance Minister Hammond Tuesday, March 13, 2018 - 00:50 
UK Finance Minister Philip Hammond says the country's economy will grow slightly faster than previously thought in the run-up to Brexit. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
UK Finance Minister Philip Hammond says the country's economy will grow slightly faster than previously thought in the run-up to Brexit. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2pfbL8n
